DOC.detailed_description: The study employ multi-center , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-groups design ass safety efficacy Kovacaine Mist deliver intranasally induce pulpal anesthesia maxillary teeth number 4 13 ( maxillary right second premolar maxillary leave second premolar ) sufficient allow completion Study Dental Procedure . The maxillary teeth categorize two subset , anterior ( teeth number 6 11 ) premolar ( teeth number 4 , 5 , 12 13 ) . The intent treat 150 subject 3 study site , 2:1 randomization within study site , overall goal 100 subject treat Kovacaine Mist 50 treat placebo . Recruitment diverse dental patient population least 25 % subject 50 year age . Randomization within stratum define age ( ≤50 > 50 year ) .
DOC.criteria: Male female 18 year age old . Need operative restorative dental procedure require local anesthesia single vital maxillary tooth ( anterior premolar tooth # 4 # 13 ) evidence pulpal pathology . Normal lip , nose , eyelid , cheek sensation . Able understand sign study inform consent document , communicate Investigators , understand comply requirement protocol . Patency naris ipsilateral tooth undergo Study Dental Procedure ( treatment tooth ) . Resting heart rate ( HR ) 55 100 beat per minute ( bpm ) , inclusive . Seated systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) 95 150 mm Hg , inclusive , seat diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) 60 100 mm Hg , inclusive . Inadequately control hypertension ( blood pressure great 150/100 mm Hg ) . Inadequately control active thyroid disease type . Frequent nose bleeds ( ≥ 5 per month ) . Having receive dental care require local anesthetic within 24 hour precede study entry . History allergy intolerance tetracaine , benzyl alcohol , ester local anesthetic , paraaminobenzoic acid ( find PABAcontaining sunscreen ) . History allergy hypersensitivity articaine , oxymetazoline , epinephrine , sulfite preservative . Use monoamine oxidase inhibitor within 3 week precede study entry . Nursing , pregnant , suspected pregnant , try become pregnant . ( Females childbearing potential require take urine pregnancy test day , prior , study drug administration rule pregnancy . ) Having receive investigational drug and/or participation clinical trial within 30 day prior study participation . History congenital idiopathic methemoglobinemia .
